articles.title: Modern Strategies for a Standout Customer Experience
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Zahoree offers AI-powered customer support solutions. Zahoree's AI-powered platform centralizes performance metrics and customer feedback data into a single, easy-to-use dashboard, giving support teams the insights they need to act quickly and effectively.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 6: New long-range option joins PHEV SUV lineup
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: BYD has expanded the Sealion 6 lineup. The mid-range Dynamic trim level returns featuring a new longer-range battery.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 6: New long-range option joins PHEV SUV lineup
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: BYD has expanded its Sealion 6 lineup by reintroducing the mid-range Dynamic trim level. This trim now features a new longer-range battery.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 6: New long-range option joins PHEV SUV lineup
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: BYD has expanded its Sealion 6 lineup by reintroducing the Dynamic trim level with a new longer-range battery. The Sealion 6 Dynamic Extended Range features a 26.6kWh 'Blade' battery pack, increasing the electric driving distance to a claimed 140km. This upgraded model also includes black cabin trim and a head-up display as standard, and is expected to increase sales of the BYD Sealion 6.

articles.title: 35 Products That Save So Much Money That You'll Pat Yourself On The Back Every Time You Use Them
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced a new "Sqeezy" sponge set, praised for its cleaning capabilities on tough projects. Oxo launched a compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer, which quickly makes cold brew. Bentgo offers a stackable lunch container for commuters. Bissell provides a multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner for stain removal.

articles.title: 20 Cleaning Products For Nightmarish Messes
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff is presented as a multi-purpose cleaner effective on grease, permanent marker, grime, pen, rust, and crayons on various surfaces. Bar Keepers Friend streak-free soft cleanser is introduced to remove rust, stains, scum, tarnish, and grime from tile, stainless steel, and porcelain, while also polishing them.

articles.title: ChatGPT chief shares trait that makes employees successful at OpenAI
articles.author: Business Insider
articles.summary: OpenAI's head of ChatGPT, Nick Turley, suggests releasing raw versions of new products like ChatGPT to gather user feedback quickly. This approach prioritizes rapid iteration over adhering to a strict initial quality bar. By shipping out something raw, companies can start learning from real users and polish the right things in AI space.

articles.title: 29 Cool TikTok Products That Deserve Your Attention
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: BuzzFeed highlights the introduction of new transfer-proof lip stains and birthday cake-flavored rice cakes. A user review praises a hair product for defining curl patterns without additional styling products.

articles.title: NING Service Experience Centers Launch in Shanghai and Bangkok, Setting a New Benchmark for the NEV Aftermarket  Aug. 10, 2025 18:58
articles.summary: NING Service, under CATL, launched its Brand Day, highlighted by the opening of a flagship experience center in Shanghai and its first overseas store in Bangkok. NING Service introduced a CTP repair service and a non-destructive testing device for battery packs. The brand is expanding its service network and establishing a closed-loop ecosystem for battery lifecycle management.

articles.title: You Might Become A Bit Obsessed With These 44 Products
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The article highlights numerous new product launches and offerings.  Sol de Janeiro introduces a Brazilian Bum Bum Cream known for its scent and skin benefits, while Tineco offers a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop. Other products include SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes, Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil, and Bissell multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner.

articles.title: OpenAI's head of ChatGPT shares the one trait you need to be successful at the company
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched GPT-5, an update to its ChatGPT product. Following user feedback, the model selection process in ChatGPT has been updated with a 'real-time router' to automatically select the most appropriate model for each request, replacing the previous dropdown menu.

articles.title: OpenAI's head of ChatGPT shares the one trait you need to be successful at the company
articles.author: Lakshmi Varanasi
articles.summary: OpenAI unveiled GPT-5, but intentionally shipped features before they were fully ready. After criticism, the model switcher in ChatGPT was removed and replaced with a real-time router that selects the most appropriate model to handle each user request. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman later said he'd bring back a fan-favorite older model.

articles.title: The Best Travel Mugs to Ward Off the Winter Chill
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: OtterBox and Snow Peak are launching new tumblers designed to keep drinks hot. These tumblers join other options like Yeti and Stanley in the market.

articles.title: 15 Shower Products To Add To Your Cart
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: EcoTools introduced a dry brush for exfoliation, while Tree Hut offers a sugar scrub for a spa-like shower experience. Sol De Janeiro promotes Brazilian Bum Bum Cream for moisture. First Aid Beauty features KP Bump Eraser scrub to soften rough skin. Dr. Bronner's offers an 18-in-1 liquid castile soap. Eos promotes cashmere shave oil. Billie provides a starter shave kit. Vaniderm has a gentle facial cleanser. L'Oreal offers 8 Second Wonder Water for hair detangling. Pantene offers bond repair hair mask. The Ordinary features glycolic acid toner.

articles.title: 29 Dorm Supplies That Are Cute And Super Practical
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: A range of products is introduced for college dorm living. Bella is launching VersaBrew 2-in-1 Coffee Maker for dorms. Urban Outfitters is launching Owala FreeSip Tumbler with a bold print.

articles.title: 33 Must-Have Products You'll Actually Use Daily
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Several new products are being introduced, including Plaud, an AI voice recorder using ChatGPT for audio summarization, and SwitchBot Smart Switch Button Pusher, which transforms devices into smart ones controlled by Google, Alexa, or an app. Additionally, Eos 24H Moisture Super Balm in marshmallow fluff flavor is released and several other tools and gadgets are launched.

articles.title: 36 Cheap Products Reviewers Are Feral About
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: E.l.f. is introducing a sheer tint, moisturizing "Squeeze Me" lip balm. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" under-eye brightener. Good Molecules released "Wake Up" eye gel, and Death Wish introduced instant coffee packets.

articles.title: 40 Products Future You Will Be Glad You Added To Cart
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: A variety of new products are being introduced, including shower rings designed for easy curtain installation, a bug bite suction tool for irritant removal, and Nippies adhesive pasties for comfortable support. Other notable items include a duffel bag with organizational pockets, a digital luggage scale to avoid overweight fees, and a rechargeable electric lighter with a flexible neck. The Olaplex repairing treatment is also mentioned to help rebuild the bonds in your hair. TruSkin Naturals Vitamin C Serum is also mentioned to give a glowy look.

articles.title: Spellai Introduces Genius Mode to Simplify AI Shirt Design Generation
articles.summary: Spellai has launched Genius Mode, a new feature for its AI shirt design generators. The feature allows users to create high-quality T-shirt designs using text prompts and offers customization options like canvas ratios, visual styles, and thematic filters. Genius Mode integrates with Spellai's platform for sharing and publishing designs.

articles.title: Tecno Spark Go 5G set to launch on August 14, design, key details confirmed
articles.author: Anvinraj Valiyathara
articles.summary: Tecno is preparing to launch the Tecno Spark Go 5G smartphone in India on August 14. This device, advertised as the slimmest 5G phone in its price range, features a 7.99mm thickness, a 6,000mAh battery, and support for offline calls via Bluetooth, alongside the Ella AI assistant with multi-language support.

articles.title: 30 Home Products That Will Change Your Life
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The article features a variety of home product launches or features. Batelier, a family-owned small business based in Poland, introduces a handmade cable organizer for convenient device charging. Bissell launches a multi-purpose portable cleaner to tackle messes and stains without cords.

articles.title: Facts \u0026 Figures Behind Galaxy Z Fold7's Ultra Camera
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Galaxy Z Fold7 features the Z Fold series' most advanced camera. This delivers an Ultra experience and transforms the way users capture, edit, and share content.

articles.title: If These 33 Products Don't Impress You, Then I'm Sorry To Say That Nothing Will
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Lumify Eye Drops reduce redness, while Eos Marshmallow Super Balm heals lips. Dr. Melaxin Peel Shot exfoliates skin, and Gold Bond's cream firms the neck. The Ordinary's serum hydrates, and Lottabody's mousse defines curls. A nausea relief inhaler provides quick relief, and a foot peeling spray removes dead skin. Catrice's brightener conceals dark circles and DEET-free mosquito-repelling bracelets stops mosquitoes.  Elizavecca hair treatment repairs hair and Laneige's blurring powder absorbs oil, while Burt's Bees soother relieves sunburn. Olay Super Serum Body Wash hydrates skin and a toothbrush mimics flossing. L'Oreal's setting spray locks in looks, Joesoef's soap clears skin, and Color Wow's spray lifts hair. SneakErasers clean sneakers, Loops Quiet 2 are designed for reducing noise, and an anti-dandruff shampoo relieves flaking. Sally Hansen's nail polish dries fast and a teeth-whitening pen lightens stains. SweatBlock wipes reduce sweating and the Pink Stuff's sponge set cleans grime.

articles.title: This Free Hack Turns Any Old Smartphone Into a Security Camera
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Alfred app enables users to transform old smartphones into security cameras. The app offers features like remote live feed viewing, motion detection with alerts, and cloud storage, with a premium version unlocking higher resolution and zoom capabilities. Users can download Alfred on both their old and new phones to begin streaming video for home security.

articles.title: This woman created a viral hairbrush, changing the game for curly hair care in Arizona
articles.author: Milca Elvira Chacon
articles.summary: Bounce Curl expanded its product line to include leave-in conditioners, define creams, shampoos, drying mittens, and bonnets. They also launched patented define brushes, which became popular on social media. In 2023, Bounce Curl opened the Bounce Curl Spa Salon in Phoenix, inspired by Japanese head spas, adding curly hair specialists to address the lack of such professionals in Arizona.

articles.title: This woman created a viral hairbrush, changing the game for curly hair care in Arizona
articles.author: Milca Elvira Chacon
articles.summary: Bounce Curl expanded its product line to include items such as leave-in conditioners, shampoos and bonnets. In 2023, Bounce Curl launched the Bounce Curl Spa Salon in Phoenix, inspired by Japanese head spas. The company's define brushes have become a popular product, gaining millions of views on social media.

articles.title: I Tried ChatGPT-5 To Make Money Online. This Is What Happened
articles.author: Rachel Wells
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT-5 on August 7 as its latest flagship model, claiming it to be smarter and more efficient than previous versions. While designed with improved accuracy and depth, it received mixed reviews, with some users finding it worse than ChatGPT 4.0. The model's capabilities were tested for freelance design tasks, revealing limitations in generating ready-to-use designs.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic: Unboxing, First Look & Price
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7 featuring an 8-inch main AMOLED display, a 6.5-inch cover screen, and a 200MP camera. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite and enhanced with Galaxy AI on Android 16 / One UI 8, the device features an Armor Aluminum build and IP48 rating.

articles.title: NING Service Experience Centers Launch in Shanghai and Bangkok, Setting a New Benchmark for the NEV Aftermarket
articles.summary: NING Service, an independent aftermarket brand under CATL, launched its 'Now Action' Brand Day. This launch includes the opening of a flagship experience center in Shanghai and its first directly-operated overseas store in Bangkok, Thailand. This initiative aims to enhance the new energy vehicle aftermarket with innovative battery maintenance and a full lifecycle ecosystem.

articles.title: Your New Favorite Product Is In This List
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Lottabody introduced Wrap Me Curl Mousse, defining curls and moisturizing with shea and coconut oil. Good Molecules launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, designed to minimize eye puffiness. Juno & Co. presented Clean 10 Cleansing Balm for makeup removal, offering a fresh and baby-faced feel.

articles.title: NING Service Experience Centers Launch in Shanghai and Bangkok, Setting a New Benchmark for the NEV Aftermarket
articles.author: Limited
articles.summary: NING launched Service Experience Centers in Shanghai and Bangkok. These centers aim to set a new benchmark for the NEV aftermarket, introducing a new service for electric vehicle owners.

articles.title: Maruti Suzuki launches 'Phantom Blaq' Grand Vitara celebrating 10 years of NEXA
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki India has launched the limited-edition Grand Vitara 'Phantom Blaq' to celebrate the 10th anniversary of NEXA. The vehicle features matte finish, lavish interiors, bespoke alloy wheels, a SmartPlay Pro+ infotainment system with wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay, and enhanced safety features including a six-airbag system.

articles.title: Wiped clean with Swypz
articles.author: Kellaray Miles
articles.summary: In 2016, Swypz launched a line of wet wipes, featuring therapeutic herbal scents. The company is expanding its product line to include travel-sized wipes, targeting the hotel and tourism sector.

articles.title: AI Plus Nova 5G review: For Rs 7,999, this phone is too good to be true
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: The AI Plus Nova G phone is reviewed and considered "too good to be true" for its price. The review assesses the value of the product in the market.

articles.title: Free Intensity Boost for 300 UC: The Safe Way for PUBG Fans to Charge Up at Al-Zahra Gate Gym
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Al-Zahra Gate introduced a promotion that offers free shipping on orders of 300+ intensity products. Additionally, Al-Zahra Gate Gym provides a free Intensity Boost for 300 UC, redeemable by PUBG Mobile players after completing a workout session. This boost enhances in-game rewards.

articles.title: AI Plus Nova 5G review: For Rs 7,999, this phone is too good to be true
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies launched the AI Plus Nova 5G smartphone, targeting budget-conscious buyers with a starting price of Rs 7,999. The phone features a 6.75-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a 5,000mAh battery, a 50-megapixel primary camera, and runs on NxTQ OS based on Android 15.

articles.title: 27 Products To Help You Escape A Messy Room
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: Levoit introduced a smart air purifier. The new Levoit air purifier filters out airborne particles to reduce dust and keeps the air fresh. The product is voice activated and compatible with Alexa or Google Assistant.

articles.title: How Endsars Protest Led Me To Establish Kloza –Quadri Akande
articles.author: New Telegraph
articles.summary: Kloza, founded by Quadri Akande, launched a collaboration platform designed for African talents and startups. This platform aims to connect individuals and communities, fostering collaboration and addressing the challenges of isolation and limited access to resources that often hinder progress across the continent.

articles.title: 32 Useful Wayfair Products For Your Kitchen
articles.author: Samantha Rumore
articles.summary: The article features a variety of kitchen products and appliances. Wayfair is highlighted with metal bar stools and refrigerator bins. Le Creuset has a 4-quart stoneware dish. De'Longhi offers an all-in-one coffee maker, KitchenAid features a stand mixer, Vitamix showcases its blender, and BoosBlock is selling a reversible cutting board.

articles.title: 都不用去分析证明， 能流传2000年的传统， 那肯定是有好处的。
articles.summary: 蓝晓988 recommends a brightening skincare product.

articles.title: Dunelm's new bedding from £38 is 'so soft' shoppers 'don't want to get out'
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Dunelm has launched the Cotton Muslin Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set, praised for its softness and available in various sizes and muted colors. Dusk is also running a summer sale, offering up to 50% off on bedding options like the Regent 400 Thread Count Embroidered Duvet Cover and the Portofino 200 Thread Count Waffle Duvet Cover.

articles.title: Amazon Australia unveils newest Kindle with key feature fans have been asking for: 'Big upgrade'
articles.author: Sarah Fitzmaurice
articles.summary: Amazon Australia has launched the Kindle Colorsoft range, featuring the first Kindle with a color display. The Colorsoft, available in 16GB and 32GB (Signature Edition) options, has received positive reviews for its upgrade from the traditional black and white version.

articles.title: Here Are GPT-5 Prompt Engineering Insights Including Crucial AI Prompting Tips And Techniques
articles.author: Lance Eliot
articles.summary: OpenAI has released GPT-5, a new generative AI, with distinctive features and functionalities. The key feature includes an auto-switcher that selects the best GPT-5 submodel based on the prompt. The company also claims that GPT-5 is more honest than prior OpenAI models.

articles.title: Online Advantages Charlotte Launches AI-Driven Search Visibility Services for Local Businesses in the AI Overview Era
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Online Advantages has launched AI Search Optimization services to enhance local businesses' visibility on Google's AI Overviews and other AI-powered search platforms. These new services include AI Overview Optimization, Local Search Automation, and Content Designed for AI Assistants. This is intended to help businesses thrive in the changing search landscape.

articles.title: Amazon Australia unveils newest Kindle with key feature fans have been asking for: 'Big upgrade'
articles.author: SARAH FITZMAURICE
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the Kindle Colorsoft range in Australia, featuring the first Kindle with a color display.  The Colorsoft comes in two options: a 16GB version and a 32GB Signature Edition and boasts weeks of battery life and a waterproof design. Covers for the Kindle Colorsoft are available in a variety of colours starting from $59.95.

articles.title: Moose Munchies Candy Co Expands Sweet Legacy Across North America
articles.summary: Moose Munchies Candy Co, a Canadian confectionery brand specializing in handcrafted fudge, offers products online and through major retailers like Sobeys and Foodland. The company plans for North American distribution and entry into overseas markets, including Australia, to introduce its signature fudge.

articles.title: Bali's crazy new wellness store
articles.author: Dave Smith
articles.summary: Yaz Duralex is launching Hydrotherapiz Lab, a new wellness concept in Bali specializing in organic perfumes, soaps, serums, and botanical candles. The lab also offers a day spa featuring unique, pod-shaped ice baths for individual cryotherapy sessions, complemented by Wim Hof breathing techniques.

articles.title: Alexa got an AI brain transplant: How smart is it now
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Alexa+, a new version of their voice assistant Alexa, which integrates generative AI. This update aims to improve conversational skills and handle complex requests, with Prime members receiving it at no extra cost, while non-Prime members pay $19.99 monthly. Although it offers enhanced capabilities, initial user experiences reveal bugs and unreliability issues.

articles.title: Mister Donut New Home Cut: Nostalgia & Low Sugar?
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Mister Donut has launched the 'New Home Cut' series, a new doughnut line that focuses on less sweetness and more complex flavor and texture profiles. This new product line features flavors reminiscent of their 1970s offerings and is available until late February 2026. The launch reflects a consumer trend towards less sweet and more nuanced flavors.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 7 cover screen apps: how to change them
articles.author: Timothy Beck Werth
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Flip7 at its Summer 2025 Samsung Unpacked event. The new flip-style foldable features a 4.1-inch cover screen, the largest on a flip foldable to date, but limits the apps runnable on the cover screen.

articles.title: 31 Products That'll Solve Those Very Specific Problems
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new products including a WD-40 pen, a ceiling fan carbon filter, and an innovative hardshell suitcase with a trunk-style opening. It also features items like Loop Quiet 2 noise-reduction earplugs and Clorox bleach pods designed to make everyday tasks easier and more convenient.

articles.title: Egypt's IMC launches website to boost traditional crafts
articles.author: Amwal Al Ghad
articles.summary: Egypt's Industrial Modernistaion (IMC) has launched a new website for the Creative Egypt project. This website aims to promote and sell traditional and artisanal products throughout Egypt.

articles.title: Tata Steel Eyes Rs 7,000-Crore Gross Merchandise Value From 'Aashiyana' In FY26
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Tata Steel is considering expanding its offerings by onboarding non-Tata Steel products. This marks a new direction for the company in its domain.
